metadata.title: USN-3963-1 -- Memcached vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Memcached incorrectly handled certain lru command messages. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause Memcached to crash, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3963-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  memcached - 1.5.6-0ubuntu1.1 No subscription required
